name: Mouse Of Cards
description:
This Roguelike Deckbuilder is part of the Game Dev Field Guide Game Jam # 23

Helpful tips:

On the Map:

- Camps heal you to full.

- The Card Collector gives you the opportunity to either duplicate a card in your deck, or remove one. You MUST take one of these actions.

- More difficult encounters reward more points towards your Score.

In Battle:

- Mouse over the icons overhead the enemies to see a description of what they will do.

 - Pay careful attention to the order in which you play cards!

- Try to build the strongest deck you can!
